## useDebouncedCallback variable

Hook to memoize a debounced version of a callback.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useDebouncedCallback: <P extends unknown[]>(callback: (...args: P) => unknown, delay: number, deps?: DependencyList) => ((...args: P) => unknown) & {
    flush: () => void;
    cancel: () => void;
}
```
